body.p: In the scenario Filters tab you can add filters to remove certain content elements from the generated output.
There are three ways to define filters:

ul.li: Use DITAVAL file - If you already have a DITAVAL file associated with the transformed map you can specify the path to it and it will be used when filtering content. You can find out more about constructing a DITAVAL file in the DITA OT Documentation topic.
Use profiling condition set - Sets the profiling condition set that applies to the document you transform.

Exclude from output all elements with any of the following attributes - You can configure a simple list of attribute (name, value) pairs which when present on an element in the input will remove it from output.
